item.title: Reply to 'Oracle Insert with mutli-valued column' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3243055/oracle-insert-with-mutli-valued-column:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'Oracle Insert with mutli-valued column' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3243055/oracle-insert-with-mutli-valued-column:

Try something like this:

insert into onTeam(date, player, teamName) 
select 'newDate','Matt Holliday', teamName 
from onTeam where player = 'Matt Holliday'
